title: Contentium case study
metaDescription: Contentium is a project, build with Next.js, allowing you to easily create a site with static editable content using a markdown source.
keywordText: contentium nextjs ssg ssr isr static content markdown
brief: **Contentium** is a project, build with [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/), allowing you to easily create a site with static (*editable*) content using a **markdown** source.
author: Ladislav Prix
